name: Dyson Savage
text: I would not waste your time ordering from any of the chains in this area. After an hour and a half we ended up just canceling the order due to background issues on their part. Additionally, there was no attempt to reconcile the issue on their part. Don't waste your time or money.

name: Wade Morris
text: Forget jalepenos multiple times ok, sauces fine, an entire pizza, wings, or bread sticks?  They are seriously incompetent, don't waste your time.  Tip nothing and maybe you will be pleased.  My receipt showed the things they forgot.  This …More

text: Friendly people the time I went. If you're in the mood for fast food pizza there are many options, and the pizza hut pan isn't bad.

name: ankit mehta
text: Quick service. Perfect for take out

name: Alethea Ruddy
text: Friendly service and tasty pizza. They were a little slow with our online order, but we only had to wait 10 minutes. Disregard any review that mentions buffets or waitresses... this is only a carryout location so there shouldn't be any reviews about that.

name: Adam Smith
text: Went for the buffet.  The salad bar was fresh and well stocked but the pizza selection was small and not varied.  Pizzas sat out quite a while before being refreshed.  Even after new ones came out they were pretty much the same.  Ok in a pinch but would go there again as a chosen destination.

name: mike surline
text: I had been ordering from this location for years. Yes i was "that guy" that ordered last minute and the driver forgot my 2 liter of pepsi. No big deal since they have always been good to me. The driver said he will have a credit attached to …More

text: Good food, friendly service. So good! I want to marry the honey barbecue wings.

text: great tasting food and staff is respectful and try to help the best they can. the manager scott is amazing! thank you for helping us out scott!

text: I've ordered deliveries here plenty of times hoping that at least one time it'll be a better experience. not only have i tipped eveytime in hopes that they'll at least remember that and make an attempt at better quality and service, but …More

text: When I placed an order a day in advance to have it picked up by 11:15 am it wasn’t ready. The customer service was rude and didn’t seem to care. I will not be doing business with again.

text: I'm so sorry to tell you that I was totally disappointed with the tomatoes on the pizza I ordered. First off, I was expecting fresh tomato.  The tomato that was present was cooked to a mush.  50 cents paid for a total of ten tiny bits of …More

text: The salad bar is small and certainly nothing to write home about. Went in for the lunch buffet, the selection of pizza was small and it was almost completely gone.

text: This Pizza Hut locale has some of the best delivery service in the Valley. I haven't had any negative experiences at all and the food is always good & HOT!!! Thank you!
